enhanced-test-scripts.comment: Enhanced NPM Scripts for Comprehensive Testing Strategy

security-and-compliance.test:security: npm run test:lambda:security && npm run test:jest -- --testNamePattern='Security|PII|GDPR'
security-and-compliance.test:audit: npm run test:security && npm run test:pii && npm run test:gdpr

ci-cd-workflows.test:ci:main: npm run test:green-core:ci && npm run test:jest:unit && npm run test:jest:integration
ci-cd-workflows.test:ci:nightly: npm run test:ci:main && npm run test:lambda && npm run test:e2e && npm run test:security
ci-cd-workflows.test:ci:release: npm run test:ci:nightly && npm run test:visual && npm run test:cross-browser && npm run test:accessibility

performance-and-monitoring.test:benchmark: npm run test:performance && npm run test:load

comprehensive-suites.test:all: npm run test:green-core && npm run test:jest:unit && npm run test:jest:integration
comprehensive-suites.test:full: npm run test:all && npm run test:lambda && npm run test:e2e
comprehensive-suites.test:complete: npm run test:full && npm run test:security && npm run test:visual && npm run test:cross-browser
comprehensive-suites.test:production-ready: npm run test:complete && npm run test:performance && npm run test:accessibility
